tasks.description: Set up Python 3.10 environment with pyenv and install dependencies
Select and download a small LLM model (e.g., DistilGPT2)
Convert the model to TensorFlow Lite format (not feasible for DistilGPT2, using TensorFlow model directly)
Implement model loading and inference in main.py using the TensorFlow model directly
Implement batch processing logic in the API
Test the API endpoints and model inference
Update documentation and rules as project evolves
Deploy to Render.com and handle memory optimization
Create lightweight version for free tier deployment (tiny-gpt2 model)
Switch to lightweight version to resolve OOM issues
